message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn to propose a bit more for myself.  It's still a good deal for you, especially considering inflation.
Come on, let's meet in the middle from our previous offers
Time is running out, and inflation is eating our potential gains. Let's split it evenly and call it a day.
I see you're getting desperate, but I'll only go down a bit
Okay, here's a compromise. I'm willing to accept slightly less than half to end this. Let's be sensible - inflation is hurting both of us now.
I'll only go down a tiny bit, you're running out of time
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  We're both losing out because of your greed.  Meet me in the middle, or we both get nothing. This is my final offer.
